languages.text: "А, прекрати, шестеренка! С Джай хотя бы разговаривать можно, а не "вести коммуникацию".
"Ah, stop it, you grouchy tin can! At least Jae can actually hold a conversation and not just 'conduct an information exchange.'"
languages.original_text: "А, прекрати, шестеренка! С Джай хотя бы разговаривать можно, а не "вести коммуникацию".

traits.locale_text: "Ah, stop it, you grouchy tin can! At least Jae can actually hold a conversation and not just 'conduct an information exchange.'"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “啊，赶紧闭嘴吧，你这个爱发牢骚的铁皮罐头！至少婕伊还能正常说话，不像某人只会‘进行信息交流’。”
languages.original_text: "Ah, stop it, you grouchy tin can! At least Jae can actually hold a conversation and not just 'conduct an information exchange.'"

traits.locale_text: “啊，赶紧闭嘴吧，你这个爱发牢骚的铁皮罐头！至少婕伊还能正常说话，不像某人只会‘进行信息交流’。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Ah, taisez-vous donc, espèce de boîte de conserve grincheuse ! Au moins, Jae est capable de tenir une conversation et pas "de procéder à un échange d'informations". »
languages.original_text: "Ah, stop it, you grouchy tin can! At least Jae can actually hold a conversation and not just 'conduct an information exchange.'"

traits.locale_text: « Ah, taisez-vous donc, espèce de boîte de conserve grincheuse ! Au moins, Jae est capable de tenir une conversation et pas "de procéder à un échange d'informations". »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «¡Déjalo estar, pedazo de hojalata gruñona! Al menos Jae es capaz de conversar y no solo de "procesar un intercambio de información"».
languages.original_text: "Ah, stop it, you grouchy tin can! At least Jae can actually hold a conversation and not just 'conduct an information exchange.'"

traits.locale_text: «¡Déjalo estar, pedazo de hojalata gruñona! Al menos Jae es capaz de conversar y no solo de "procesar un intercambio de información"».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「ああ、やめて、そんなに気を悪くしないで！少なくとも、ジェイは現に話に応じてるわけだし、ただの”情報交換”ってわけでもないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Ah, stop it, you grouchy tin can! At least Jae can actually hold a conversation and not just 'conduct an information exchange.'"

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、やめて、そんなに気を悪くしないで！少なくとも、ジェイは現に話に応じてるわけだし、ただの”情報交換”ってわけでもないでしょう」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ach, hört schon auf, Ihr grummelige Blechbüchse! Zumindest kann Jae tatsächlich eine Unterhaltung führen, und nicht nur 'einen Informationsaustausch durchführen'."
languages.original_text: "Ah, stop it, you grouchy tin can! At least Jae can actually hold a conversation and not just 'conduct an information exchange.'"

traits.locale_text: "Ach, hört schon auf, Ihr grummelige Blechbüchse! Zumindest kann Jae tatsächlich eine Unterhaltung führen, und nicht nur 'einen Informationsaustausch durchführen'."

languages.original_text: "Ah, stop it, you grouchy tin can! At least Jae can actually hold a conversation and not just 'conduct an information exchange.'"

languages.text: "Bir sus be huysuz teneke! Jae en azından sadece 'bilgi alışverişi yapmıyor', gerçekten sohbet edebiliyor."
